name: Camo Cuff Patch Beanie
description:
Ready for the winter? Need to keep your dome warm? This is an easy choice. This beanie is made from polyester and cotton, with a rubber pvc patch attached to the side. Represent the brand that has been around since the beginning!

One size fits most. Comes in Green/Tan Field Camo. 

Exclusive run, ONLY 25 MADE! Act fast! 

***NOTE, these will ship after November 1st, 2013. Please place your order now to ensure your reservation on this product**

name: Original Brand Windbreaker Jacket
description:
Yup, that's right, you are looking at history! We had to reintroduce one of the Scribe heavy favorites back from 1994-1996.

Keep warm and dry this Fall and Winter with a Scribe Windbreaker! This piece is made from 100% Nylon on the outer shell, and the body lining is a thin soft material consisting of 65% poly, and 35% cotton. It buttons down in the front for closure and the arms have elastic in the bands to keep you warm and wind-resistant. 

They are embellished the new standard SCR rubber patch on the lower front right, and a full back print of the original Scribe logo.

These are made in LIMITED EDITION RUNS! First come, first serve! Enjoy!

NOTE: This jacket fits baggy. If you are looking for a more fitted feel, please size down from your original size. All sales are final on this item!

name: 12'-13' AM Team Wheel
description:
This is the first Amateur Team wheel for Scribe Industries! A high quality pour and core for your everyday blade needs! 2 color graphic print to give some flare to your new setup!

The wheels are made at a 58mm, 90a hardness. They come in a set of 4, and ready to hit the parks and streets. This new compound has become an industry favorite with high longevity and the cores are made to withstand 6 times the impact of any other core in the market. (not including dual durometers).

name: Classic Henley Raglan T-Shirt
description:
Simple, classic, and super comfortable. Soft touch to the hand, with a nice conformed fit. 

Made from 50% cotton, 38% poly and 12% rayon. Colors available are ash grey w/ heather black.

Embellished with the classic SCR rubber patch.

**THIS IS ON BACK-ORDER. ALL ORDERS WILL SHIP ON NOVEMBER 5th, 2013**

name: V-Neck Hooded Sweatshirt
description:
Talk about class and comfort. This hooded sweatshirt is a single-ply tshirt material v-neck hooded sweatshirt. 58% cotton, 38% poly, 12% rayon. Extremely comfortably for those chilly moments where you don't need a full out fleece garment.

These hoodies are a modern fit. They will fit formed, fitted to your body with some stretch to the actual material.

They are embellished with a rubber patch logo on the front left chest, and a middle back one-color print of the new SCR logo.

ONLY 75 made, selling out quickly! Grab yours, before they are gone!

name: Brett Dasovic v1 Pro Wheel
description:
This is the first pro wheel for rider Brett Dasovic! A high quality pour and core for your everyday blade needs! 4 color graphic print to give some flare to your new setup!

The wheels are made at a 57mm, 89a hardness. They come in a set of 4, and ready to hit the parks and streets. This new compound has become an industry favorite with high longevity and the cores are made to withstand 6 times the impact of any other core in the market. (not including dual durometers).

name: Ambidextrous Wristbrace v2
description:
First off, not to confuse customers, this is not a wristguard, this is a wrist brace with a removable splint for your convenience. This brace will not save you entirely from a broken wrist, but may PREVENT a broken wrist or wrist/palm injuries. 

Features:
- Removable Metal Splint on Palm Side
- Ambidextrous 
- Added Palm Protection
- Breathable Neoprene Wrap + Ventilation 
- Reinforced Velcro Strap
- Sleek & Comfortable Design
- One Size Fits Most

This package only includes 1 ambidextrous wristbrace. If you are looking to protect both hands please purchase 2.

name: Retro Hooded Sweatshirt
description:
A classic piece to the Scribe collection. Definitely a perfect piece for any seasonal occasion. This is an American made piece that is 14oz/100% cotton, fleece lined. 

The Retro Hooded Sweatshirt comes ONLY in ash grey and in sizes small to xlarge.

Supplies are limited so act fast! Perfect for back to school, holiday gifts, and Spring time!

name: Grind Stones Anti-Rockers 40mm
description:
This is the first version to a highly successful and popular anti-rocker wheel. These anti-rockers are a one piece wheel that fits any standard abec bearings. Features a one color skull concept design on each wheel. 

These wheels act like a grind block because of the low size, but they help you roll in situations that you need most: rolling down stairs, rolling over cracks, rolling over curbs, etc. Get the extra grinding h-block space you need with the extra flavor.

These grind-stones come in a set of 4.

name: Ceramic Bearings w/ Spacers
description:
Addicted to speed and momentum? Ceramic bearings may be for you! Ceramics should not be taken lightly. They are a high performance bearing and offer a terrific ride and smoothness to the SERIOUS rollerblader that is willing to take care of these bearings! You must maintain these weekly to monthly to insure their longevity but it is worth the work if you are willing to ride faster then the pack. These bearings come in a custom collectors tin, and include 8 bearings and 4 spacers, enough for 4 wheels!

The bearings are equipped with rubber sidewall shields that can be removed and snapped back into place easily for cleaning and maintenance. The rubber helps with ventilation of the bearings to make sure your bearings last as long as possible without significant fast damage due to corroded steel. 

These bearings are under our Scribe Warranty Policy which is listed under the "Contact Us" section of the main website. Please visit it for further information. 

NOTE: Ceramic bearings need EXTREME care and maintenance on a weekly to monthly basis, depending on the conditions you are skating in. These high performance bearings can only last as well as you take care of them!

name: Abec 7 Bearings w/ Spacers
description:
Scribe comes through with high-quality Abec 7 Bearings that will make you roll; smooth, fast and long. These bearings come in a custom collectors tin, and include 8 bearings and 4 spacers, enough for 4 wheels!

The bearings are equipped with rubber sidewall shields that can be removed and snapped back into place easily for cleaning and maintenance. The rubber helps with ventilation of the bearings to make sure your bearings last as long as possible without significant fast damage due to corroded steel. 

These bearings are under our Scribe Warranty Policy which is listed under the "Contact Us" section of the main website. Please visit it for further information. 

NOTE: Maintenance and taking care of your bearings is important to the longevity of each bearing. Extreme exposure to water, snow, etc MAY result in bearing seizures or failures. Please use your bearings in appropriate conditions.

name: Artic Thermal Longsleeve
description:
Just perfect for those chilly fall days, or brutal winters, or maybe you are catching a chill on the beach late at night - this thermal longsleeve is sure to keep you comfortable and warm!

Made from 50% cotton, 38% poly and 12% elastane. This material is fitting, and conforming to your body type. Very sleek, and comfortable for all occassions. (Hang dry to keep true size).

This Scribe piece comes in one color: oatmeal and is embellished with a top left chest screen print, and a rubber patch on the front lower right of the garment. 

Keep warm, look classy and support the company that has been supporting rollerblading since the beginning.

name: Abbreva V-Neck
description:
This is a honey stopper, panty dropper! This extremely comfortable vneck will be a great addition to any fashion arsenal. The main SCR logo is printed full chest on 100% pre shrunk cotton. It features a tagless neck print for your comfort. 

This vneck is available in both ash grey and royal blue.
Sizes: small to x-large.

name: Emboss Dog Tag
description:
The Scribe dog-tag has been an ideal accessory to most any rollerblader since 2008. This revamped edition is a bit different from the style we used to feature.

This new tag features a black etched laser print on a silver tag with a clear apoxy gloss dome over the face of the design giving a clean-cut effect. Chain is included.

Supplies are limited, so please order immediately!

name: Slash T-Shirt
description:
We had to do it. New times called for new changes. We had to reinvent the original Scribe logo. With help from a close friend and high-end graphic designer: Fade Hurricane we like to present the new Scribe "Slash" logo. This design is printed in one color on 100% preshrunk cotton. Air dry for best results. This shirt also features a tagless neck print for your comfort and ad additional printed logo on the back neck.

This shirt comes in two colors: black and heather green
Sizes: small to x-large

name: Never Give-Up T-Shirt
description:
A bold shirt for a bold person. This design can be worn in any occasion and setting. The phrase "never give up, never surrender" is present in the main design. This shirt is 100% pre-shrunk cotton. It features a tagless neck print for your comfort. Please air dry for best results.

This style shirt comes only in white. Sizes small to xlarge.

name: Traditional Logo T-Shirt
description:
Love Scribe as much as the rest of us? Then show your support and represent your favorite company with the "Traditional Brand" t-shirt.
Printed on 100% preshrunk American Apparel cotton. Features a tagless neck print for your comfort. This shirt is produced in small numbers. If it is sold out, please contact us so we can work on bringing in more inventory of this staple product.

Shirt comes in both teal and black and is available in sizes SM-XL.

The model in the picture is wearing a LARGE. He is 6'0 160 Lbs.

name: Painters T-Shirt
description:
Want to be noticed? The moment you put this shirt on your back people recognize you! The accented colors pop well on the true black tshirt. Printed on 100% preshrunk American Apparel cotton. One of the best fits for any traditional tshirt top. Shirt comes with custom labeling to insure it was a Format Distributions product, and a four color front print.

This is a LIMITED EDITION product. Once this sells out there will be no re-runs unless the demand is met. Please support Scribe and your local rollerblade scene!

name: Abec 9 Bearings w/ Spacers
description:
Scribe comes through with high-quality Abec 9 Bearings that will make you roll; even smoother, faster and longer than our 7's. These bearings come in a custom collectors tin, and include 8 bearings and 4 spacers, enough for 4 wheels!

The bearings are equipped with rubber sidewall shields that can be removed and snapped back into place easily for cleaning and maintenance. The rubber helps with ventilation of the bearings to make sure your bearings last as long as possible without significant fast damage due to corroded steel. 

These bearings are under our Scribe Warranty Policy which is listed under the "Contact Us" section of the main website. Please visit it for further information. 

NOTE: Maintenance and taking care of your bearings is important to the longevity of each bearing. Extreme exposure to water, snow, etc MAY result in bearing seizures or failures. Please use your bearings in appropriate conditions.

name: Cuffed Ribbed Skull Beanies
description:
A specialty product of Format Distributions. This beanie has been manufactured for Scribe and Con.Artist Brand for over 15 years now! One of the most comfortable beanies you could put on your head. Made of a 80/20 polyester to cotton blend so its extremely stretchy and form fitting along with keeping your head warm in the cold days and keeping it cool and breathable on the warmer days! A definite top pick amongst most Scribe customers and retailers!

This is available in maroon, ash grey, navy blue and charcoal.
This product will be DISCONTINUED FOR THE 2011 season unfortunately. :( So make sure to pick yours up now before they are sold out for good!

name: Ribbed Skull Beanie (uncuffed)
description:
A specialty product of Format Distributions. This beanie has been manufactured for Scribe and Con.Artist Brand for over 15 years now! One of the most comfortable beanies you could put on your head. Made of a 80/20 polyester to cotton blend so its extremely stretchy and form fitting along with keeping your head warm in the cold days and keeping it cool and breathable on the warmer days! A definite top pick amongst most Scribe customers and retailers!

This is available in black, ash grey, and charcoal.
This product will be DISCONTINUED FOR THE 2011 season unfortunately. :( So make sure to pick yours up now before they are sold out for good!

THIS IS THE UNCUFFED VERSION. Please take note.
